entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 11:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 near the water early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
